content: stitches from round 6 of the base using a stitch marker mark the stitch in the middle of the oval in the last row opposite the muzzle ears - do not chain 1 at the end of the row left ear with right side facing insert the hook in the stitch from row 1 behind the slip_stitch 4 stitches to the left of your marked stitch row 1 6sc turn 6 st row 2 - 12 6sc turn 6 st row 13 scdec 2sc scdec turn 4 st row 14 4sc 4 st fasten_off leaving a tail to tack down the ear tack down ear in the 5th stitch of row 1 to the left of the base of ear right ear with wrong side facing insert the hook in the stitch from row 1 in front of the slip_stitch 4 stitches to the left of your marked stitch row 1 6sc turn 6 st row 2 - 12 6sc turn 6 st row 13 scdec 2sc scdec turn 4 st row 14 4sc 4 st fasten_off leaving a tail to tack down the ear tack down ear in the 5th stitch of row 1 to the right of the base of ear eyes - make 2 with black round 1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring slip_stitch into first stitch fasten_off leaving long tail sew the eyes between row 1 and 2
